website_summaries.verdict: A budget hydrating cleanser for those with normal to oily skin.
pros: Most customers find the scent of this cleanser pleasant
Good cleaning action and leaves the skin feeling moisturized and smooth
Lathers up, which some customers prefer
Economical as it’s well priced and lasts a long time
cons: May not leave those with dry skin feeling sufficiently moisturized

customer_reviews.title: Don't Use Without Moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: At first, this worked really well on my skin. I LOVE the smell (kind of like watermelon?) and it felt good on my face. However, I noticed that after using this particular cleanser I had to put on a very liberal amount of hydrating cream or moisturizer because it left my face feeling extremely dry. If I just cleaned my face and forgot the moisturizer, I'd be in for a day of flaking and discomfort. That really takes away from the product...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Soapy, Clarifying, Fresh
customer_reviews.text: I have naturally oily and sensitive skin and need a facial cleanser that I can use a few times each day. Some of the higher end brands worked fine, but my skin didn't feel quite as clean and refreshed. For me this is the right balance of cleaning, freshening, but not totally stripping. A nice fresh but delicate scent. The biggest surprise is how "soapy" it is. I can wash my face with just a few drops- it's so soapy. This will last a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry C

customer_reviews.title: It actually wakes me up!
customer_reviews.text: Works as it's intended to. My face always feels much cleaner & crisper after using. I do have very sensitive skin & it did break me out (but not terribly) when I first started using it but it has since went away & I'm about halfway through the bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Perry

customer_reviews.title: Always a favorite
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! I've used it for my daily skin-care routine for several years now. I love the fresh scent and feel after I use it and works great for my type of skin, which is very prone to acne. Would definitely recommend it again and again!
customer_reviews.author: AA Salas

customer_reviews.title: Want a clean refreshed glowing face? Well this is for you
customer_reviews.text: I love how my face feels after using this face cleaner. My face feels cool and refreshed, I love the light scent it has, it lathers up nicely and a little goes a long way. My face has a certain clean glow since I have been using it. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Sabine Britt

customer_reviews.title: Great relaxing smell works just as good as other scents and face wash from Clean and Clear
customer_reviews.text: Smells great, and I haven’t found it in stores before. A much more pleasant scent than the long over used citrus scents most face washes use. Works well for my face and beard to clear the sweat and oil away.
customer_reviews.author: Just a dude reviewing stuff

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: I really like the face wash, smells great & does exactly what it says. What I like more is purchasing the face wash on amazon than any store.
customer_reviews.author: Mena Villasenor

customer_reviews.title: It's okay
customer_reviews.text: The product itself can be harsh on your skin with the beads however, I only purchase clean and clear brand products because it is one of the most cheapest skincare brand. This product itself is alright. It does its job by cleansing your skin but I think I might have to switch to CeraVe which I've heard has way more benefits other than just cleansing your skin with harsh chemicals.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Caused me to break out..
customer_reviews.text: Did not work for me. Face did not feel freshly clean after use. Had a clear face before, after using this product I had a bad break out:/
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine

customer_reviews.title: Great love it
customer_reviews.text: 3 stars. only because it leaked out and was over the bottle. The scent is good the price is great but the packaging needs to be better so it doesn't open. Other then that It is good. *update they sent a new bottle it's great unopened none leaked out thanks so very much!*
customer_reviews.author: Amazonbuyer

customer_reviews.title: Can’t use because nozzle broke off upon first attempt.
customer_reviews.text: Unable to write a review because when I tried to pump some out, the nozzle broke off, so I couldn’t get any. I haven’t returned it because I’m quarantined and disabled, so it’s next to impossible for me to get this to work without just ordering (& paying for) another one.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi McMasters

customer_reviews.title: Buy buy buy
customer_reviews.text: My favorite face wash. My skin is so oily and the funny thing is any time I use any face wash it becomes dry af and I peal even while using a moisturizer. This works as long as you buy a non- oily moisturizer. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Echevarria_

customer_reviews.title: Smells amazing but not an acne wash
customer_reviews.text: Smells amazing. Like watermelon jolly ranchers. However this is not an acne fighter. My skin is pretty good so I’ll use it up but would not buy again. It’s my fault for not reading closely but I assumed anything from this brand would have some skin clearing agents in it.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Jo

customer_reviews.title: Simply love the scent!
customer_reviews.text: The is the best smelling face soap I ever used. Truly a great scent! With just a tiny drop you can wash your whole face. Great value. 5 stars!!
customer_reviews.author: Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Love this facial cleanser!
customer_reviews.text: I have noticed a difference since I began using this facial cleanser daily. My skin is smoother and feels very clean. I enjoy using this product. It has made a difference in my complexion.
customer_reviews.author: Baird-Greene

customer_reviews.title: Ugly duckling no more
customer_reviews.text: My 11 years old son going through early puberty and breaking out. Got this and now his face is clear and smooth as a baby’s ass. Recommended for getting back that confidence.
customer_reviews.author: H.T.

customer_reviews.title: Best face wash for me.
customer_reviews.text: One of the only product lines i can use on my skin, without it drying up, getting greasy, or breaking out. I love it, and the scent of cucumber is not like gross like some are, but refreshing.
customer_reviews.author: Aeva Rose

customer_reviews.title: Amazing refreshing scent
customer_reviews.text: I bought the set of Clean & Clear Morning Burst products (exfoliant, this cleanser, and moisturizer) for the first time recently. I don't feel compelled to write reviews for the others -- they're fine, they do the job as far as I can tell. But I wanted to write a review for this cleanser just because the SMELL IS AMAZING! It's a cucumber scent that always makes me feel refreshed when I pump it out, and to me it's well worth it just for that.
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: Strong smell
customer_reviews.text: I use clean and clear to wash off my makeup before using another cleanser for acne. This was my least favorite of the line, it smelled really artificial. Did not break me out though so it served its purpose
customer_reviews.author: Mimikatherine

customer_reviews.title: Very excited!!!
customer_reviews.text: I’m trying to start a collection of clean and clear products lol , but as soon as it delivered I rushed to the bathroom to put it to use, and it made my skin feel so clean and fresh & I loved the cucumber scent! Many people have said the other morning burst dried their skin out so I made sure to get the hydrated kind, and my clean and clear mosterizer is still shipping! Thanks for reading I hope this helped or entertained you I guess💙
customer_reviews.author: Precious Jones-jackson

customer_reviews.title: Worth it 🤗
customer_reviews.text: I always keep face wash in my shower. 🧖 This has a nice light scent & is gentle on my face. For the price, you can't go wrong! 👍
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Addicted

customer_reviews.title: Not satisfyable, liquid spills out!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Received the damaged product, seems the some of it spills out somehow. Pros - product is decent. Cons- plastic Container is very thin, if i drop it i might can get broken or badly damaged.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Clean & Clear Cleanser
customer_reviews.text: The cleanser works well to help clean skin, however a bit drying in the winter. I guess this is better to be used in the summer when skin is more oily compare to the colder months.
customer_reviews.author: Tung

customer_reviews.title: A great body wash for my legs and arms, not face though
customer_reviews.text: Super super oily. I love it as a body wash, and it smells great, bit it's not a good face wash at all.
customer_reviews.author: Mikayla

customer_reviews.title: Smells good
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my daughter. Did not work for. She had a clear face before, But after using this product she had a bad break out. She liked the smell though.
customer_reviews.author: RM2020

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: i just love it - i love how it leaves my skin in the morning - fresh and clean for skin care routine
customer_reviews.author: Vivi77

customer_reviews.title: Good for sensitive to normal skin
customer_reviews.text: Great moisturizing face wash for normal to sensitive skin!!! I alternate between this one and another one they have
customer_reviews.author: rhianna

customer_reviews.title: Buy
customer_reviews.text: Love this product, smells like watermelon lightly. Helping my kids acne, bought several times!
customer_reviews.author: J DICKINSON

customer_reviews.title: Really does wake you up!
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a cleanser that wakes you up and gives you a good clean, this is it!
customer_reviews.author: Drkgoddess20

customer_reviews.title: Beer 🍺 Me
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I can’t get the pump to work. It’s locked up. I have to unscrew it to use. Not a huge deal, but kinda sucks. 🤨
customer_reviews.author: Michael C. Sak

customer_reviews.title: Smells great!!!
customer_reviews.text: Not the most thick I’ve had but I for sure enjoy the scent! Leaves my face feeling clean and not oily
customer_reviews.author: Thezogs

customer_reviews.title: Naah, don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Not going to buy another one. Its just plain soap, the beads don’t do much. Can’t feel them at all. Leaves my skin oily.
customer_reviews.author: AC

customer_reviews.title: Works as intended
customer_reviews.text: Works very nice for people with dry skin and oily doesn't over Dry very nice smell
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this face wash. I have always been a fan of clean and clears face washes but this one is my all time favorite. The scent smells so good! And brightens my every morning, the beads in it make it feel like it is really cleansing your face, and the best part is after wards it leaves your face feeling soft and clear.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Good product, poor shipping
customer_reviews.text: Great smell, great product. Good for a drugstore skincare product at a nice price. I had to take a star off though because the pump was completely broken off upon arrival. I’ve read in reviews that others have had this same issue. I had to use a pump from another bottle, which is annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Talia Rotshtein

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: I love this face wash smells good and works good . Doesn't break me out
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Buckley

customer_reviews.title: It dries my face
customer_reviews.text: I really want to love this product, but i don't think it's for me. It dries my face real bad.
customer_reviews.author: Alex G

customer_reviews.title: Not perfect but just okay
customer_reviews.text: Definitely wakes me up in the morning. Smells amazing but doesn’t bubble up as much as one would want— but it does cleanse, just to an extent. I just need to cleanse twice to ensure all my makeup is gone and that my skin is clean. For the price, I’d say I should’ve expected this.
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Good product but expiry date is not mentioned on it
customer_reviews.text: Everything is good. Good for oily skin but make normal skin dry.
customer_reviews.author: Kajol

customer_reviews.title: oil remover
customer_reviews.text: I like the product. It clean face, remove all oil but it makes face little dry
customer_reviews.author: Anita Suwal

customer_reviews.title: a bit spilled still good
customer_reviews.text: Smells really good the bottle was a tad spilled it smells really good like yk that hubba Bubba smell of watermelon smells like that lol
customer_reviews.author: Yadira

customer_reviews.title: Love!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this face wash!! It makes my skin feel so clean and smooth!
customer_reviews.author: Ana Elsey

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I've used this for many years now. Its a basic face wash and doesn't make my face dry out. Perfect for everyday face cleanser.
customer_reviews.author: Laura GR

customer_reviews.title: cleans very well for my skin.
customer_reviews.text: it cleans my skin very well. it has a cucumber smell.
customer_reviews.author: Doris

customer_reviews.title: Harsh on skin
customer_reviews.text: I have a normal to dry. This one was little harsh on my skin, had breakouts. Might work for other skin types.
customer_reviews.author: Nirupama

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: Difficult to open. Really took long time just to open the damn pump. This facewash feels like normal soap, not a face wash. Didn't get the bids out as well. The scent is decent with cucumber flavor. It's oil free and does not stick longer.
customer_reviews.author: forsupercool

customer_reviews.title: Pump Doesn’t Work
customer_reviews.text: I love the feel of this face wash, but the pump on the bottle doesn’t work which is pretty inconvenient. I have to dump it into my hand every time.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Fenn

customer_reviews.title: Bursting In the morning
customer_reviews.text: It works great on my skin and does wake me when I use it with a great smell I love this product.
customer_reviews.author: Roro

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: Spout would not release after turning it multiple times in each direction, then broke off when I pushed down.
customer_reviews.author: Peter J Cioffi

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: Came with the cap broken. Does not pump at all as the pump cap was broken.
customer_reviews.author: Aubrey G2016

customer_reviews.title: Good for oily, not so much for dry
customer_reviews.text: I have combination skin and found this too drying. Great product for oily skin, but too drying on other areas. Not for me.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki of CA

customer_reviews.title: good cleanser
customer_reviews.text: This product does not have as many beads as I expected, but it is otherwise a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Keeps skin clean and fresh!
customer_reviews.text: Wakes me up and keeps my skin feeling clean and fresh. Just make sure to use a moisturizer after using this cleanser as it will leave your skin a little dry.
customer_reviews.author: Jamuna H

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I have sensitive, oily skin that is prone to breakouts. This is the only face wash that I trust. My face is clear, with no acne breakouts. Worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Liysha

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Favorite of all time! I cannot switch to anything else this keeps my skin so smooth and clear!
customer_reviews.author: Morrissa

customer_reviews.title: Great face wash!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product that I have been using for many years. It makes my skin smooth and feels fresh. The best thing is that I have not broken out from using this product!
customer_reviews.author: Aman Patel

customer_reviews.title: Best face wash ever!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this face wash so much. It actually feels like you are washing face well compared to other brands where it is so subtle you wouldn't even feel fresh.
customer_reviews.author: Neeti

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: This product is bad for your skin. The product has scent in it and scents are not good for the skin and overall does not work .Clean and Clear is a bad skin brand it does not work nor is it effective on skin
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Packaging!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. But bummed about the shipping the top was busted and can’t be opened. Still using though!
customer_reviews.author: Lottie

customer_reviews.title: Love this cleanser!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great cleanser! Love the smell of it! It really cleaned my skin and made my skin feel smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Lydia

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This product is a great cleanser. It helps my face feel clean and refreshed.
customer_reviews.author: realistic chick

customer_reviews.title: Best facewash
customer_reviews.text: We purchase this all the time for our family. Smell is great and works wonders for my skin!
customer_reviews.author: jbritt

customer_reviews.title: Soft skin
customer_reviews.text: Makes my skin feel soft and renewed and nice refreshing scent
customer_reviews.author: carley

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: I love to wash my face in the morning and at night. With this product my skin feels fresh and soft
customer_reviews.author: Nathalia Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Love love it!
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't find locally in stores. So glad you had it!

customer_reviews.title: Broken bottle
customer_reviews.text: The packaging was not the best for the type of product and the container arrived broken. Will need to use a different recipient to use the product :(
customer_reviews.author: Marlen G.

customer_reviews.title: Can't ever use. Broken pumps
customer_reviews.text: The pumps break, regardless of where we buy. Can't use them like I want.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Package busted
customer_reviews.text: It busted when I got it but I love the brand.
customer_reviews.author: madison

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Best face wash! I have sensitive skin and have been using this for over 4 years. Good on oily skin as well.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: love this !!
customer_reviews.text: I love this so much makes my face feel so smooth and smells so amazing
customer_reviews.author: Nachali

customer_reviews.title: Clean, refreshing feeling
customer_reviews.text: Skin feels clean after use! Very refreshing. Smells nice too. Need to moisturize afterwards because skin feels tight
customer_reviews.author: TKlosterman

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Love this product!! Wonderful scent and keeps my face clear !
customer_reviews.author: michelle bone

customer_reviews.title: Breakout fast
customer_reviews.text: I was breaking out with red dots on my face
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This si an excellent cleanser. It leaves your skin with a moist, clean feeling. I highly recommend this product!!!
customer_reviews.author: alice green

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t wake me up the way I wanted. 😔
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed in the product. When it described “waking up your face” and beads cleaning with a fresh feeling I was expecting my skin to feel tingly or refreshed. But I did not. The wash is very creamy. I could not fill any of the beads. It’s hard to rinse off because it is so think. Feels more like using a cream to wash your face. It does leave it soft but not what I was looking for to wash the nightly oils away and for my face to “wake up”. I personally will not be purchasing this item again. Not a bad product, just not for me.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Prosser

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful stuff
customer_reviews.text: For years I'd been moisturizing after washing but still ending up with areas of dry skin on my face. Neither "moisturizing" facial soaps or exfoliation had helped, either. This cleanser completely solves the problem. The only inconvenience is that it seems to require a little more rinsing than my previous face soap. Everyone's tastes and skin type are a little different but the scent of this one is to my liking, and at $4.88 for 8 oz., it's not a huge risk to give it a try. I'm now a loyal customer.
customer_reviews.author: M.M.C.

customer_reviews.title: Good but very soapy, dab will do ya!
customer_reviews.text: Smells good, my skin gets definitely dry after using it so I know It’s a good cleanser. I just Like face washes that have like that minty fresh feeling after and I dont Get that with this and it also foams/bubbles a lot so a dab will do you with this stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Leaves behind residue
customer_reviews.text: This face wash does the job of cleansing and hydrating your face, but it leaves behind a sticky reside on my hands. I always need to scrub my hands after washing my face to get rid of it. I also don’t like the feeling that something is still on my face after washing it. Will not be purchasing again, but could be a good purchase for someone who has dry skin issues on their face.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: refreshing
customer_reviews.text: There are several types of this face wash. The night time one I have used for many years. This one I use in the morning. It is so fresh smelling! Makes me feel refreshed and wide awake. This one was one I had not seen in the store and part of a 3 for deal. I love it! My face does not feel tight or drawn. Just fresh & clean
customer_reviews.author: LinnyLou

customer_reviews.title: Prevents acne and leaves face clean and fresh
customer_reviews.text: This face wash works great to prevent further acne development. It has micro beads for exfoliation, in practice it’s only a light exfoliation not a deep scrub. The scent is fresh, and smells natural not like chemicals. I would get a different product if you are looking for true exfoliation, but if you want a good acne face wash this is a great choice.
customer_reviews.author: crc711

customer_reviews.title: Go for it
customer_reviews.text: I love this face wash. My face has never looked better! Not over drying or oily/ greasy. It’s perfect for combination skin. I use it daily and it has made my skin feel softer and look brighter. At 32 and after two kids I feel like it makes my skin glow better than when I was in my teens.
customer_reviews.author: CCM08004

customer_reviews.title: Bad smell
customer_reviews.text: This has a very odd smell. I have to force myself to use it because the smell is just terrible
customer_reviews.author: Alyson Moyano

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Oh my gosh this face wash smells amazing!! Will definitely be ordering this again from now on. Face feels free of any oils or anything and the smell makes me happy. Win win.
customer_reviews.author: Adam and Melissa

customer_reviews.title: It’s like putting cucumber skin on your face only better 😄
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this. I have tried all the versions and this is by far my favorite. It smells amazing and gives me a sense of freshness after my shower every morning! Totally recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Theano Pateraki

customer_reviews.title: A nice product
customer_reviews.text: It works for my oily skin and it smells nice. I follow up with a cream so I can’t say whether or not it dries skin out, but I would probably buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Maureisha Abrams

customer_reviews.title: Was a gift
customer_reviews.text: This cleanser was a stocking stuffer for our daughter at Christmas. She likes the stuff so it has to be good. She is a very picky person.
customer_reviews.author: Hawgfan

customer_reviews.title: Leaking bottles
customer_reviews.text: The product is fine, but it was sent in plastic bags, thank goodness, with the product leaking into the bag. Visual inspection of the containers shows about 15% of the product gone from each of two bottles. The bottles seem to not have been screwed in tightly enough.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte E. Valdizan

customer_reviews.title: Poorly Prepaird For Shipping
customer_reviews.text: Have not used product but have no reason to believe it is not a good value for the money. The box was soap soaked in 2 corners due to the tops of 2 bottles not being tight. A lack of quality control at the finish.
customer_reviews.author: D. Bernie Downes

customer_reviews.title: Yep!
customer_reviews.text: Good face wash, leaves skin clean, and invigorated. Washes off just fine. Very satisfied
customer_reviews.author: B. Hinson

customer_reviews.title: Morning refresher cleanser
customer_reviews.text: Received nicely packaged. This is a great morning facial cleanser. I use it daily for glowing skin.
customer_reviews.author: P

customer_reviews.title: Love this!!
customer_reviews.text: Great cleanser - my skin feels totally clean after each use. Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: JanetD

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I love the scrent of this face wash! Makes washing my face more enjoyable.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Soso
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't smell that great, was hoping it would be similar to the morning burst facial lotion.
customer_reviews.author: wlou

customer_reviews.title: Refreshing smell
customer_reviews.text: Love this smell to wash my face. Husband loves it too. Feels and smells so good.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn M

customer_reviews.title: My skin feels smooth
customer_reviews.text: Definitely not enough beads to get the effects of exfoliating but it does leave my skin feel smooth. A little bit slippery but as long as you rinse well, it's good.
customer_reviews.author: Bubbly

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this brand, i have use all the morning burst one and i love all of them
customer_reviews.author: Reyna V.

customer_reviews.title: Great product for dry skin
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product! My face feels so much better just after using it a few times!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Moisturizes your face!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite facewash. Less expensive than others of the same product!
customer_reviews.author: Beard

customer_reviews.title: It has good quantity and quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: It is frothy and leaves my skin smooth, although I must moisturize it later because it tends to dry. It has good quantity and quality for the price. When it is finished I will order another one
customer_reviews.author: SantaG

customer_reviews.title: GREAT!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this face wash! I usually get like eight hours of sleep a day (not enough for me) and after i wash my face i feel like i had TEN!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Elg

product_meta.title: Clean & Clear Morning Burst Oil-Free Hydrating Facial Cleanser with Cucumber & Green Mango Extract, Gentle Daily Face Wash for All Skin Types, 8 fl. Oz, Pack of 1
product_meta.description: Use Clean & Clear Morning Burst Hydrating Facial Cleanser to wake up your face while also removing dirt, oil and impurities that build up overnight. Specially formulated with Bursting Beads technology, this gentle foaming cleanser features a unique blend of cucumber and green mango extracts that work to deeply cleanse skin for a clean, refreshing feeling. Its invigorating fragrance wakes you up to help jump start your day and its nourishing formula works to actively hydrate skin. This morning facial cleanser is made with an oil-free, hypoallergenic and non-comedogenic formula so it won't clog pores, and is suitable for daily use.
feature_bullets: 8-fluid ounces of Clean & Clear Morning Burst Hydrating Facial Cleanser with cucumber and green mango extract to nourish and refresh skin while removing dirt, oil & impurities that build up overnight
Daily face wash contains Bursting Beads to help gently remove dead skin cells and cleanse skin, and features an invigorating fragrance that energizes your senses to help jumpstart your day
Its unique oil-free formula is made with cucumber and green mango extract for refreshing cleanse that leaves skin feeling beautiful and invigorated
Suitable for everyday use, this foaming facial cleanser can be used as part of your daily routine and is designed for all skin types, making it ideal for normal, oily and combination skin
This hydrating face wash is oil-free and hypoallergenic, and rinses clean so it won't clog pores

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
